data.eml:eml: Larval morphology of the water mite Forelia brevipes (Neuman, 1880) (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Pionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tuzovskij, Petr V. (2019): Larval morphology of the water mite Forelia brevipes (Neuman, 1880) (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Pionidae). Zootaxa 4550 (3): 433-438, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4550.3.12
